basics.name: Pan Ziyue
basics.Research Interests: Aerospace Avionics and Subsystems, Electronics Engineering and embedded systems, Remote sensing, Earth sciences (geospatial applications), Robotics

work.name: FourierIndustries (startup)
work.summary: Co-founded a startup company during secondary school with several of my schoolmates developing apps for the school, which later expanded to embedded hardware design for education and 3D printing services.
highlights: Developed in-house applications for the school from 2013 to 2015: SST Announcer (RSS feed viewer), Places@SST - (Bluetooth-based indoor navigation), SST Open House 2014 (Official school open house app), SST Lens (Simple photo editing application)
Developed the SPEEEduino, a modular IoT-enabled AVR+ESP8266 microcontroller platform for Singapore Polytechnic, which won a tender for 500 pieces in 2017

Developed the SSTuino (2018-2021) and SSTuino II (2022-present), an educational IoT-capable AVR+ESP32 microcontroller board targeting secondary schools, custom built for the School of Science and Technology, Singapore

work.name: Earth Observatory of Singapore
work.summary: Interned at the Earth Observatory of Singapore in NTU for 22 weeks.
highlights: Assisting in the consolidation and stabilization of the Microsoft Azure port of the Hybrid Science Data System (HySDS), working in collaboration with NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL). HySDS is a highly scalable, hybrid cloud platform for scientific computation, with a particular focus on processing data from earth observation satellites.

work.name: Satellite Research Center (Nanyang Technological University)
work.summary: Interned at the Satellite Research Centre (SaRC) in NTU for 6 weeks during the March-April semester break to gain a deeper understanding of micro/nanosatellite engineering.
highlights: Developed the ORBITAL, a cross-platform desktop application written in Java to help highlight anomalies in satellite orbital data of the VELOX-II nanosatellite.

work.name: buUuk Pte. Ltd.
highlights: Interned at buUuk Pte. Ltd. for half a month in February of 2016 to gain more experience about professional mobile development companies in Singapore, and aided in the development of one of their client projects.

education.institution: Singapore University of Technology and Design
courses: Computer Engineering specialisation, Double Minor in Computer Science and Digital Humanities
GPA 4.18/5.0, SUTD Global Distinguished Scholarship Holder
GPA 3.965/4.0, Director’s Honour Roll AY2016/17, AY2017/18
Founding Vice President of SP Maker’s Club

skills.name: Software Frameworks
keywords: System Administration: Red Hat and Debian Linux based systems
Mobile app development: iOS and Android native SDKs
Space platforms simulation: AGI Systems Tool Kit (Level 2 certified)

skills.name: Embedded Computing Platforms
keywords: Platforms: Atmel AVR microcontrollers, RP2040 ARM microcontrollers, ESP32 Wi-Fi-capable microcontrollers

skills.name: Programming Languages
keywords: General purpose: Python, C and C++, Java
Mobile app development: Swift, Kotlin, Objective C
Web Technologies: TypeScript and JavaScript, PHP 7

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
